<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.01//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/html4/strict.dtd"> <html> <body>
<script> function add() { google.calendar.addCalendar("en.usa#holiday@group.v.calendar.google.com", "US Holidays"); } </script>
<center> <button onclick="add()">Add US Holidays</button> </center>
</body> </html>
